item.title: Aleka: a schema agnostic protobuf decoder
item.description: Introducing a command line tool to decode protocol buffer messages without a protobuf schema definition.

item.title: Bulk eBook Converter
item.description: Script that wraps the ebook-converter linux command line tool for a convenient bulk usage.

item.title: Reddit Urls Scraper
item.description: Showcasing a command line tool to fetch urls from posts from a given subreddit.
